title: Readout of Vice President Biden’s Call With President Juan Manuel Santos of Colombia | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Vice President


For Immediate Release
November 17, 2016

 



Readout of Vice President Biden’s Call With President Juan Manuel Santos of Colombia





	Vice President Joe Biden spoke by phone yesterday with President Juan Manuel Santos of Colombia.  The Vice President congratulated President Santos on reaching a revised peace accord between the Colombian government and the FARC.  The two leaders discussed the importance of maintaining strong bipartisan support for Colombia in the United States Congress.  Both leaders underscored their commitment to supporting a successful peace process in Colombia.
